extensionDescription.message: Enhancer for Nebula. Adds some quality of life features to the nebula player.

optionsTitlePlayer.description: Title for the player subsection of options page.

optionsTitlePage.description: Title for the page subsection of options page.

optionsTitleScripts.description: Title for the scripts subsection of options page.

optionsTitleOther.description: Title for the other subsection of options page.

optionsEnable.description: Text next to enable/disable feature textbox.

optionsPlaybackChangeRateTitle.description: Title for speed change rate of options page.

optionsPlaybackChangeRateLabel.description: Label for speed change rate of options page.

optionsPlaybackChangeRateHint.message: The amount to change the speed when scrolling over the new speed button, e.g. 0.1.
optionsPlaybackChangeRateHint.description: Hint for speed change rate of options page.

optionsAutoplayTitle.description: Label for Autoplay of options page.

optionsAutoplayQueue.description: Label for Autoplay in Queue of options page.

optionsAutoplayHint.message: Whether to make the video automatically play or not. Note that this depends on your browser, see here. Optionally only with an active queue.
optionsAutoplayHint.description: Hint for Autoplay of options page.

optionsVolumeScrollTitle.description: Label for Volume Scroll of options page.

optionsVolumeScrollLog.description: Log scale label for Volume Scroll of options page.

optionsVolumeScrollShow.description: Label for Volume Indicator of options page.

optionsVolumeScrollChange.description: Change rate label for Volume Scroll of options page.

optionsVolumeScrollHint.message: Whether to make scrolling over the player change the playback volume. Optionally in logarithmic scale (as opposed to linear).
optionsVolumeScrollHint.description: Hint for Volume Scroll of options page.

optionsLoadYoutubeTitle.description: Label for LoadYoutube of options page.

optionsLoadYoutubeHint.message: Whether to automatically try and find the matching YouTube video or not. Works only with the 50 newest videos.
optionsLoadYoutubeHint.description: Hint for LoadYoutube of options page.

optionsLoadNebulaTitle.description: Label for LoadNebula of options page.

optionsYtOpenTab.description: Option to automatically open found link.

optionsLoadNebulaHint.message: Whether to automatically try and find the matching Nebula video or not.
optionsLoadNebulaHint.description: Hint for LoadNebula of options page.

optionsLoadRSSTitle.description: Label for LoadRSS of options page.

optionsLoadRSSHint.message:
Whether to automatically add a RSS/Atom feed to the page.
Caution: The feed is generated by the external page leonick.se!
optionsLoadRSSHint.description: Hint for LoadRSS of options page.

optionsVisitedColorTitle.description: Title for visited color of options page.

optionsVisitedColorLabel.description: Label for visited color of options page.

optionsVisitedColorHint.message: Color to apply to links to visited videos. Can be any valid CSS color value, blank to not style; e.g. #6fbce6
optionsVisitedColorHint.description: Hint for visited color of options page.

optionsVisitedColorInvalid.description: Hint for invalid visited color of options page.

optionsManageHiddenCreators.description: Button text to manage hidden creators.

optionsManageHiddenCreatorsNone.description: Hint that no creators are hidden.

optionsCustomScriptPageTitle.description: Label for adding custom scripts to webpage of options page.

optionsCustomScriptPageHint.message: Allows to add custom JavaScript code to be executed on the Nebula page.
optionsCustomScriptPageHint.description: Hint for adding custom scripts to webpage of options page.

optionsCustomScriptPagePlaceholder.description: Placeholder for adding custom scripts to webpage of options page.

optionsCustomScriptWarning.message: Caution! Only insert code from trustworthy sources!
optionsCustomScriptWarning.description: Warning for adding custom scripts to player of options page.

optionsShowChangelogTitle.description: Label for showing changelog on update of options page.

optionsShowChangelogHint.message: Whether to show changelogs after updating the extension.
optionsShowChangelogHint.description: Hint for showing changelog on update of options page.

optionsShowChangelogButton.description: Button text for showing changelog now of options page.

optionsChangelogInstalled.message:
Thank you for installing this extension!

Below you can find an extract of the changelog.

Please also explore the options to find out about our features!
optionsChangelogInstalled.description: Markdown text in changelog modal body for when extension is installed.

optionsChangelogYourVersion.description: Text to put next to current version in changelog modal.

optionsChangelogAllReleases.description: Text to put below version list in changelog modal.

optionsReloadNote.message: Note: For the above changes to apply, you need to reload the Nebula page.

pageNothingToPlay.description: Title for queue when nothing selected.

pageShareLink.description: Label for share input with link.

pageShareStartHere.description: Whether to start with the current title when sharing.

pageQueueNext.description: Player hint for next in queue.

pageQueuePrev.description: Player hint for previous in queue.

pageWatchOnNebula.description: Watch on Nebula button on youtube.

pageVideoConfidence.description: Nebula video match confidence on youtube.

pageSearchConfidence.description: Nebula video match confidence for search on youtube.

credits.message: Constantin Piber :: Source :: Bugs and Feature Requests
